jsymbolic2.features

Class MEIFeatureExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsymbolic2.featureutils.MIDIFeatureExtractor
      • jsymbolic2.featureutils.MEIFeatureExtractor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NumberOfGraceNotesFeature

    public abstract class MEIFeatureExtractor
extends MIDIFeatureExtractor
    The prototype for feature extractors. Each class that extends this class will extract a particular feature from a window of MEI data. Such classes do not store feature values, only extract them. Notice that this class extends MIDIFeatureExtractor and thus inherits all the functionality of that class except for the MIDIFeatureExtractor.extractFeature(Sequence, MIDIIntermediateRepresentations, double[][]) function, which has been replaced by the extractMEIFeature(MeiSpecificStorage, Sequence, MIDIIntermediateRepresentations, double[][]) function and thus will throw an UnsupportedOperationException if it is called.

    • Method Detail

      • extractFeature

        public double[] extractFeature(javax.sound.midi.Sequence sequence,
                               MIDIIntermediateRepresentations sequence_info,
                               double[][] other_feature_values)
                        throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException when called as this class is for MEI features and not MIDI features.
        Specified by:
        extractFeature in class MIDIFeatureExtractor
        Parameters:
        sequence - The MIDI data to extract the feature from.
        sequence_info - Additional data about the MIDI sequence.
        other_feature_values - The values of other features that are needed to calculate this value. The order and offsets of these features must be the same as those returned by this class's getDependencies and getDependencyOffsets methods respectively.The first indice indicates the feature/window and the second indicates the value.
        Returns:
        Nothing returned as this functions is not supported for MEI features.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown all the time since this function is not supported for MEI feature extraction.

      • extractMEIFeature

        public abstract double[] extractMEIFeature(org.ddmal.jmei2midi.meielements.meispecific.MeiSpecificStorage meiSpecificStorage,
                                           javax.sound.midi.Sequence sequence,
                                           MIDIIntermediateRepresentations sequence_info,
                                           double[][] other_feature_values)
        Feature to be extracted from the mei specific storage object.
        Parameters:
        meiSpecificStorage - The storage that holds all accessible mei specific data.
        sequence - The MIDI sequence that this mei feature corresponds to. Notice that this can be taken directly from the MeiSequence.
        sequence_info - The jSymbolic intermediate reprentation for MIDI information.
        other_feature_values - The values taken from the other features.
        Returns:
        A double array to conform with the MIDI Feature Exctraction.
